description.raw:
This is another API change. It affects the way a topic/service is advertised. Now, `Advertise()` will only accept the topic/service name and one optional parameter of type `AdvertiseOptions` that contains all options to be applied to this particular topic/service. For now, the only option allowed is the ability to change the default scope. 

This change will allow to extend the number of options in the future without breaking the API.

CI results:

* [Trusty is happy](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64/30/).
* [Homebrew is pending](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/24/).
* [Windows is happy](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/61/).

title: Advertise options
